objective.description: Rhetorical Knowledge
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Focus on a purpose

objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Locate, evaluate, organize, and use research material collected from electronic sources, including scholarly library databases; other official databases and informal electronic networks and internet sources
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>

objective.description: Understand and exploit the differences in the rhetorical strategies and in the affordances available for both print and electronic composing processes and texts
objective.bfw_description: <p>Adopted by the Council of Writing Program Administrators (WPA), April 2000; amended July 2008.</p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the development of the Outcomes Statement, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html" data-mce-href="http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html">http://comppile.org/archives/WPAoutcomes/continue.html</a></p><p><br></p><p>For further information about the Council of Writing Program Administrators, please see</p><p><br></p><p><a href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/" data-mce-href="http://www.wpacouncil.org/">http://www.wpacouncil.org</a></p><p><br></p><p>A version of this statement was published in <em>WPA: Writing Program Administration</em> 23.1/2 (fall/winter 1999): 59-66</p>
